application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition 5 (Flood Risk Assessment/Sustainable Drainage Systems Strategy) of planning permission 22/05984 (Construction of single-storey rear extension at lower ground floor level providing terrace at ground floor; construction of staircase providing access from ground level to rear garden; lowering of existing floor level at lower ground floor; raising of existing flat roof to rear to match neighbouring extension; installation of 2 rooflights to main roof; and extension of existing flat roof at lower ground floor within side passage, including removal of conditions 4 (Trees and landscaping) 11 (Noise attenuation measures) 12 (Construction Traffic Management Plan (CTMP)) 13 (Professional management of engineering works) 15 (Code of Construction Practice) 16 (Positive pumped device) and variation of Condition 14 (Considerate Constructors Scheme) of planning permission PP/22/02404.)
